refnamediv.refpurpose: Parses input from a string according to a format

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The function sscanf is the input analog of printf. sscanf reads from the string str and interprets it according to the specified format. If only two parameters were passed to this function, the values parsed will be returned as an array.
Any whitespace in the format string matches any whitespace in the input string. This means that even a tab \t in the format string can match a single space character in the input string.
See also fscanf, printf, and sprintf.
